events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but it doesn’t fit as expected. I would like to request a refund for this item, please.
The issue was identified as a refund request related to a sizing problem with the purchased item.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request for the customer’s jacket order.
Hello! I’m Sarah from support. I’ve received your request for a refund and I’m here to assist you with the process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the item is unused and still has the tags attached?
Sure, my order number is 456789. The jacket is unworn, and the tags are still attached exactly as when delivered.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated your refund process. You will receive an email with return shipping instructions shortly.
That’s great, thanks! I appreciate the quick help and will follow the instructions once I get the email.
We have successfully processed the refund request and sent the return shipping label to your email address.
Just following up to ensure you received the return label and that your refund process is going smoothly. Let us know if you need further assistance.
Since there are no further issues reported, we are closing this refund case. Thank you for contacting support.
